sql:
SELECT
    "year",
    GBIF_EEARGCode(
      1000,
      decimalLatitude,
      decimalLongitude,
      COALESCE(coordinateUncertaintyInMeters, 1000)
    ) AS eeaCellCode,
    speciesKey,
    species,
    COUNT(*) AS occurrences,
    MIN(COALESCE(coordinateUncertaintyInMeters, 1000)) AS minCoordinateUncertaintyInMeters,
    MIN(GBIF_TemporalUncertainty(eventDate)) AS minTemporalUncertainty
  FROM
    occurrence
  WHERE occurrenceStatus = 'PRESENT'
    AND "year" = 2024
    AND genusKey = 5219857
    AND datasetKey = '9a0b66df-7535-4f28-9f4e-5bc11b8b096c'
    AND hasCoordinate = TRUE
    AND (coordinateUncertaintyInMeters <= 1000 OR coordinateUncertaintyInMeters IS NULL)
    AND speciesKey IS NOT NULL
    AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'ZERO_COORDINATE')
    AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_OUT_OF_RANGE')
    AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COORDINATE_INVALID')
    AND NOT ARRAY_CONTAINS(issue, 'COUNTRY_COORDINATE_MISMATCH')
    AND LOWER(identificationVerificationStatus) NOT IN (
      'unverified',
      'unvalidated',
      'not validated',
      'under validation',
      'not able to validate',
      'control could not be conclusive due to insufficient knowledge',
      'uncertain',
      'unconfirmed',
      'unconfirmed - not reviewed',
      'validation requested'
      )
  GROUP BY
    "year",
    eeaCellCode,
    speciesKey,
    species
  ORDER BY
    "year" DESC,
    eeaCellCode ASC,
    speciesKey ASC;
